Description.Title: SnowDensity
Description.ExtendedDescription: Computes the bulk density of the snow cover (kg/m^3). If snow depth and total snow water equivalent are both greater than zero, density is calculated as (Sdry_t1 + Swet_t1) / Sdepth_t1, where Sdry_t1 and Swet_t1 are the solid and liquid water equivalents (mmW) and Sdepth_t1 is snow depth (m). Otherwise, the previous day's density ps_t1 is retained.
Description.ShortDescription: Bulk snowpack density from SWE and depth with fallback to previous value.

Input.name: ps_t1
Input.description: density of snow cover in previous day

Input.name: Sdepth_t1
Input.description: snow cover depth in previous day

Input.name: Sdry_t1
Input.description: water in solid state in the snow cover in previous day

Input.name: Swet_t1
Input.description: water in liquid state in the snow cover in previous day

Function.name: model_snowdensity
Function.description: Computes current snow density from prior-day density, depth, and water equivalents.
